title: A Person Hack my Email.
body:
Well, Hello Riot Support or anyone who is reading this. 10 days ago I was playing quietly when a guy came into my account "TheRedWizzard" which in the game is "ADC Babysitter", and the thing is that I see someone I went into my account scared me because only I had the password and I went to change the password quickly and trying to change the boy had also entered my gmail eh that's when I resorted to ask for help writing this. Seeing that the person who has all my personal information, passwords, blah blah blah, I create a new gmail and start deleting all the keys of the previous gmail so that the person who hacked me there or what he has done to enter me email and in my LoL account I did not know more information and all the important information was moved to a new gmail account (which I will not say for fear of the same thing happening) and that is why I need someone to give me instructions to change the gmail and the password without the other person seeing it since i tried to change the password but it does not leave me since the other character says no to the password confirmation. I need help because I am very scared because I have valuable things and I put money in this account.

Rito Pls i need answers.

replies.body: I do not know if I explain myself well but since I saw someone enter my gmail and enter my LoL account I'm very nervous

No worries friend! I was able to check your account's login history, and it does seem like something odd was going on which could have been a hacker. 

Do me a favor and click this link: [**Click Here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

and pick the option "I need help recovering my account" so that our account recovery agents can help you out ^_^!
